channel.title: 🏢 University of Western Ontario on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Western Ontario on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Learning from Noisy Labels via Conditional Distributionally Robust Optimization
item.description: This paper introduces AdaptCDRP, a novel algorithm that uses conditional distributionally robust optimization to build robust classifiers from noisy labels, achieving superior accuracy.
